divs: Sighting DetailsGoing eastbound, I noticed out left had window a grey object circular going toward moffet field SFO line. The bottom of the object had a textured surface similar to egg crate (It had many smaller inverse domes going around the circular grey shape). I found it facinating that I was watching this thing go over in broad daylight approx. 1,000-2,000 ft. off the ground going over a major highway. It was high enough up to be the same altitude as incoming 747 headed toward SFO on approach but had no wings that I could tell, though it was going the same speed of an incoming airliner. It 'floated' past and I was so astonished, I forgot to pull out the cellphone and grab a pic, plus trying to concentrate driving in morning traffic. When first noticed the object, My immididate reaction was this was extraterrestial. I know airplanes and this wasnt one. After sighting I thought I must have just somehow seen something either astonishing or was plain mistaken somehow. I didnt think anyone would believe me if I did report it anyway. I lost site of the object behind trees as the freeway dipped in elevation by a golf course.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Mountain View
There were no other sightings in Mountain View on or around December 21st 2009
Summary: Traveling 237 eastbound past Moffett Field exit a cirular grey object overhead
